triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: The paper addresses fundamental limitations of standard off-policy deep RL algorithms in batch learning settings.

triples.name: Deep reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: Deep RL combines neural networks with RL, which is the core focus of the paper's algorithmic contributions.

triples.name: Q-learning
triples.relevance: Q-learning is foundational to DQN, one of the standard off-policy algorithms the paper identifies as problematic.

triples.name: DQN
triples.relevance: DQN is explicitly mentioned as a standard off-policy algorithm that fails in fixed batch settings.

triples.name: Actor-critic algorithm
triples.relevance: DDPG is an actor-critic method; the paper addresses DDPG's limitations in batch learning.

triples.name: Policy gradient method
triples.relevance: Policy gradient methods underpin DDPG and other algorithms discussed in the paper.

triples.name: Batch reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: The paper introduces batch-constrained RL, a novel class of algorithms for fixed batch learning without exploration.
